title: Estimating
description: Create accurate project estimates with intelligent cost calculations, material tracking, and automated pricing that eliminates guesswork and reduces bid errors.

sections.imageAlt: BuilderSolve selecting cost codes in a spreadsheet-like interface
sections.text: Easily create detailed estimates using a familiar spreadsheet-like interface. Quickly add cost codes, quantities, and unit prices to build comprehensive project estimates and budgets.

sections.imageAlt: Dynamic material tracking system showing real-time inventory and pricing updates
sections.text:
Track material quantities, costs, and availability in real-time. Our system integrates with major suppliers to provide current pricing and delivery schedules.

Automatically calculate waste factors, bulk discounts, and seasonal price variations. Never over-order materials again with precise quantity calculations based on your project drawings.

sections.imageAlt: Labor cost analysis dashboard displaying crew productivity rates and time estimates
sections.text:
Accurately estimate labor costs using productivity rates specific to your crews and project types. The system factors in skill levels, working conditions, and project complexity.

Historical performance data helps refine future estimates. Track actual vs. estimated labor hours to continuously improve accuracy and profitability.

sections.imageAlt: Competitive bidding interface showing market analysis and pricing strategies
sections.text:
Analyze competitor pricing patterns and market trends to position your bids strategically. Our database helps you understand local market conditions and pricing standards.

Win more profitable projects by bidding competitively while maintaining healthy margins. Real-time market intelligence gives you the edge in competitive bidding situations.
